cause.description:
The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society is the world's largest voluntary health organization dedicated to funding blood cancer research, education, and patient services. The Society's mission: Cure leukemia, lymphoma, Hodgkin's disease and myeloma, and improve the quality of life of patients and their families.
This cause is dedicated to my father Bob Geagan who was diagnosed with Leukemia (AML) in April. He recieved a Bone Marrow Transplant on July 17th ...Join the cause to help find a cure, you could help save a life:)
1. Every five minutes, someone in this country is diagnosed with blood cancer: Every ten minutes, someone loses the fight.
cause.mission: cure blood cancers such as leukemia, lymphoma, hodgkin's disease and myeloma
